data.message: your mellowed out most of the time down whatever, you say you want too be happy, well so do i. im right in front of your face from time too time, so why dont you just catch me? thats what the man is suppose too do.men chase woman.it doesnt have too be a stupied wop. were not here for that, where here too grow and learn, the sooner you discover this the better off we will be in future centuries, from here and there forth.
